channel.title: Website Layout
channel.description:
Well, I couldn't help but notice none of the MITB designs had flow in them whatsoever. So I thought, why not make a site myself. So far I've only made a quick sketch of what I want in PS. It came out sorta like I wanted it, simple. Also, don't bother to ask me what icons I've used. I made them myself.
Things already worked on:
[ul][*]Reducing the crispyness of the M[sup]2[/sup] symbol [*]The banner ofcourse[/ul]
http://img526.imageshack.us/my.php?image=sketchup1ml9.png

item.title: Website Layout
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:11, topic:158574”]Err, it’s awesome.
But you shouldn’t use those type of talk there, suck as “Pservers” to “Servers” or “Private Servers”
“Some new articles” to “Articles” or “New Articles”
And you should never use “stuff”, as in your “Copyright stuff etc”, and you put etc in an unexpected area…

Other than wordings, it’s just… awesome.[/quote]

I think you didn’t notice that this is a sketch and that hes not going to leave the Articles and Copyright stuff like that…

Read full topic

item.title: Website Layout
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Wow, nice icon making skills. Someone like you could make sprites and shit.

The only thing I have to criticize is the color, and the nav bar. Mopar uses the default smf colors, simple. The nav bar just seems so… ordinary. Not to say I wouldn’t use it on a site I was making.

All in all, I’d give it an 8/10.

Read full topic
